pr_title: Fix test timeout for health on master failover

timeline.message:
Fix test timeout for health on master failover

testHealthOnMasterFailover could timeout on some of the health requests
in the case where an index is added, since the recovery leads to
extended test run time.

Closes #62690

timeline.bodyText: Just for my understanding: We took more than 1 minute here to get 20 (empty) shards to recover? Isn't that indicative of some other issue?
timeline.author: original-brownbear

replies.bodyText: That time could include the 10 master restarts as well as some recovery time. The health call may not be able to respond until the settings are updated below.
replies.author: henningandersen
